means: 延伸(extend的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Parallel lines will never meet no matter how far extended.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论延伸多长，平行线永不相交。

sentence.Network_en: Loans were extended to help pay the interest on the old ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些贷款延期偿还以支付旧账利息。

sentence.Network_en: The training covers extended periods in obstetrics and gynaecology.
sentence.Network_cn: 该培训包括产科学和妇科学的增加课时。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这就是扩展（Extended）分区。当一个分区被建立，其类型被设为“扩展”时，扩展分区表也被创建。
如果你已经有扩展分区(extended)时，系统会提示：要新增主分区(Primary)  还是逻辑分区(Logical)  如果你还没有扩展分区，那么系统会.
扩展的（Extended）：IBM 是我所期望的计划提供延伸扩展的众多组织之一。我们目前正努力重构 RUP 使其为 OpenUP 建立一套扩 …
This can be extended to n X n tridiagonal matrices ., 这可以推广到 nXn 三对角线的矩阵.

list.abs: 的扩展器（Extender）和AmbientProperties对象还未有效。而当ReadProperties事件发生时，控件就已出现了。
化学及化工专业词汇英语翻译(D-I) ... exposure time 曝光时间 extender 增量剂 extender pigment 体质颜料.
CAD快捷命令大全 ... E,*ERASE 删除 EX,*EXTEND 延伸 F,*FILLET 圆角.
【免费下载】考研英语词汇大全 - 豆丁网 ... ban n. v. 禁令，禁止 extend v. 延长 indefinitely adv. 无限期的.

encyclopedia.content: 含义： 本身是延伸的，伸出的，伸展的等的意思 扩展： 在计算机领域通常指文件版本中的一种，因其有延长的含义即用来表示正式版之后的一个加强版本，其功能较之正式版本有较大完善 例如：Adobe Photoshop CS4 Extended. 和其相似的类型有： trial（试用版） unregistered（未注册版） demo版 正式版 release registered standard deluxe reference professional（专业版） enterprise（企业版） 其他版本 除了以上介绍的一些版本

entry.def: If something happens for an extended period of time, it happens for a long period of time.

example.ex: Obviously, any child who receives dedicated teaching over an extended period is likely to improve.
example.tran: 很明显，任何长期接受用心教育的孩子都有可能取得进步。

means.word_mean: 1. relatively long in duration; tediously protracted;

sentences.sentence: "his extended legs reached almost across the small room"

means.word_mean: 4. drawn out or made longer spatially;

sentences.sentence: "the extended airport runways can accommodate larger planes"
"a prolonged black line across the page"

means.word_mean: 5. beyond the literal or primary sense;

sentences.sentence: "`hot off the press' shows an extended sense of `hot'"

means.word_mean: 6. large in spatial extent or range;

sentences.sentence: "an extensive Roman settlement in northwest England"

auth_sentence.content: There will be extended coverage on the Red Button.
auth_sentence.res_content: There will be extended coverage on the Red Button.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There will be extended coverage on the Red Button.

auth_sentence.content: But Hamilton's job has extended far beyond that.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Hamilton's job has extended far beyond that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Hamilton's job has extended far beyond that.

auth_sentence.content: Think of an extended commercial for Schweppes Bitter Lemon.
auth_sentence.res_content: Think of an extended commercial for Schweppes Bitter Lemon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Think of an extended commercial for Schweppes Bitter Lemon.

Sentence.sentence: Mothers are far more likely than fathers to take advantage of this law,But extended leaves and part-time employment are known to be harmful to careers—for both genders.
